title: The most important interpretations of seeing the market in a dream

preview.html: Dream Market Shopping is one of the basic jobs that people do in order to satisfy many of their desires and needs, whether basic or recreational. Dreaming about shopping during sleep has many connotations for dreamers that vary accordingly with some specific cases. This article explains the most important interpretations that will benefit many in understanding what it means. Dreams related to this topic, let's get to know them. Market in a dreamMany scholars argue thatInterpretation of a dream about marketIn a dream, this indicates that the dreamer is striving to achieve a certain goal that he has been pursuing for a long time and will soon be able to achieve it. His life during the coming period, but if a person sees in his dream that he is buying unnecessary things, this indicates the occurrence of events that will make him feel very distressed. If the dreamer sees in his dream that he is buying a piece of land, this symbolizes that he will have the opportunity to work outside the country and he will be far away. For his family and loved ones to achieve many achievements. Which he has always dreamed of, is evidence that his marriage contract is close to a girl he loves deeply. Market in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interprets a person’s dream of buying in a dream as evidence of his desire to achieve many of the things he was striving to achieve, and he will be able to achieve his desire soon and obtain What he wants. As he will achieve many financial gains during the coming period and will reach a prominent position among his competitors. In the event that the dreamer sees in his dream that he is making a purchase, this indicates the luxurious living situation he was enjoying at that time and his life full of luxury and high potential, and it will be restored. The relationship between them soon. The Asrar website for dream interpretation is a site specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. Just write. A site about the secrets of dream interpretation. Search for it on Google and get the correct interpretations. Shopping in a dream for a single woman. Seeing a single woman in a dream because she bought some of her basic needs, but the money that She had it with her, but it was not enough, so it is a sign that she is facing many obstacles that stand in her way of achieving her goals, and she is facing great difficulty in getting rid of them due to her lack of experience in these matters, even if the dreamer saw during her dream that her desire to buy a very luxurious car This symbolizes the great ambitions she has before her eyes, and she will not do so. She gives up until she reaches her goal. If the dreamer sees in her dream that she is buying some foods that she likes, this is an indication that she is trying to please herself too much and follows the whims of the soul without considering the consequences of these things. She buys a lot of valuable things, and this represents her marriage to a man who has great power and status, and she will live with him in prosperity and happiness, and he will fulfill all her desires. Shopping in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married woman in a dream because she is buying a lot of home orders, this is a sign that she is trying as much as possible. Save money so as not to burden her husband. If a woman sees in her dream that she is buying valuable things, this symbolizes that her husband will receive...

title: What is the interpretation of a dream when you see or hear Surat Al-Mulk in a dream?

preview.html: What is the interpretation of a dream when you see or hear Surah Al-Mulk in a dream? Surat Al-Mulk is one of the surahs that upon hearing or reading a person feels comfortable and safe. A person is surprised when he hears the certainty of a surah like Surah Al-Mulk, and therefore search for an interpretation of this vision, and reciting Surah Al-Mulk in a dream indicates To see a lot of goodness for the dreamer, abundant food, justice, piety, and avoiding sins, and therefore we will discuss. To know more about the comprehensive interpretation related to the dream of seeing or hearing Surat Al-Mulk, follow us.Seeing or hearing Surat Al-Mulk in a dreamSeeing Surat Al-Mulk in a dream means happiness and joy in life. The dreamer: Seeing it is a great blessing to experience, because the person with the vision is close to his Lord and his behavior is with everyone. The vision also states that the dreamer is trying to protect himself from any sins that he may have unintentionally committed because he always wanted to please his Lord. Reading the Qur’an to children is clear evidence that they They earned a lot of livelihood in this world and the hereafter. It indicates that the dreamer is looking forward to spreading justice among people to spread kindness among them. Watching the mother reading the Qur’an indicates that she is visiting the Sacred House of God. It also indicates that the dreamer will achieve great things and a position of prestige (Glory be to God ) in the grace of God. This dream is an affirmation of the attainment of all happiness, success, and satisfaction of God’s wise needs, and free of all worries and sorrows. Perhaps this is a sign from God that the dreamer will not be tortured in the future and will have great mercy after death. This also indicates that he is valuable Great in the sight of the Lord and He will not submit to any sin. If the dreamer hears a vision of some verses expressing torture. This clearly indicates that he is on the path of sin and must immediately turn away from sin. Seeing or hearing Surat Al-Mulk about a married woman, this dream proves that she lives in safety and comfort in her home with... A good family and a chosen husband. When you see her reading this verse to her children and allowing them to hear it in their dreams. This indicates that her love for her children and care for them is evidence of her protection from any potential harm. A sign of harm in their lives. If the reader is a wife, then the dream should treat her with love and respect. If she reads the Qur’an without understanding or knowing its meaning, this indicates her hypocrisy with her husband and those around her. Seeing or hearing Surah Al-Mulk for a single woman, the dream indicates that she was in a relationship with a person with High morals. They work together to please God for fear of God’s punishment and the afterlife. Read the Qur’an in a dream and read the entire Holy Book of God, as this is important evidence that the Lord of the Worlds protects him. And to grant her respect for the world and the future, which benefits her more and makes her learn and learn. Realize everything she is looking for In her personal life. Seeing hearing Surat Al-Mulk in a dream indicates many good things that the dreamer will obtain. It also indicates an abundance of blessings in the dreamer’s life. Reading Surat Al-Mulk also indicates happiness and stability in the dreamer’s life. Seeing Surat Al-Mulk in a dream indicates The blessing of livelihood and money. It also indicates God’s mercy and blessings. Reading in the dream also suggests avoiding the dreamer’s sins and misdeeds. Seeing or hearing Surat Al-Mulk for Ibn

title: Interpretation of seeing a green plain in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a green plain in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, Ibn Kathir, and Imam Al-Sadiq. For the single woman, the married woman, the pregnant woman, the man, the young man, and the divorced woman. What is the interpretation of an unmarried girl who sees a green plain in a dream? Seeing a single girl on a green plain in a dream. Sitting in the middle is a sign that he is striving to achieve his ambitions and dreams. Seeing the single girl walking in the middle The can and the appearance of its beautiful scent is evidence that God will grant her good and abundant sustenance. Seeing unmarried women seeing a green orchard in a dream is an indication that God will fulfill all her dreams and aspirations. See also: Interpretation of seeing someone bathing in a dream. What is the interpretation of a married woman who sees a green orchard in a dream? A married woman seeing A green orchard in a dream and eating food to eat is evidence of the presence of affection, love, and the strength of her relationship with her husband and his family. Seeing a married woman playing with her children and having fun in the green orchard is an indication of their wonderful success in studies and good upbringing. Seeing a married woman sitting in the middle of a huge orchard is a sign to bring kindness, blessings, and livelihood to her husband. See Also: Interpretation of seeing green lemons in a dream. What is the interpretation of a man who sees a green orchard in a dream? The man sees the green orchard and walks in the middle of it, and its smell is very beautiful, indicating that the doors of livelihood and goodness will be opened for him. A man seeing a woman sitting in a large orchard is a sign of the strength of his relationship with this woman and their strong connection. With each other. A man’s vision of owning a green and spacious orchard in a dream is a sign of livelihood with many qualities. See also: Interpretation of seeing green mint in a dream. What is the interpretation of a pregnant woman who sees a green orchard in a dream? Seeing a pregnant woman in a green orchard in a dream and having her children sitting in the middle is evidence of an easy birth. And the ease of her birth and her freedom from the fear and anxiety of childbirth. Seeing a pregnant woman in a green orchard in a dream indicates that he was born without pain and childbirth and that he did not feel any pain. See also: Interpretation of seeing green peppers in a dream. What is the interpretation of a young man who sees a green orchard in a dream? Seeing a young man in a dream In a green orchard, sitting next to him and looking at him often shows that he is constantly thinking about the future and bears great responsibilities. Seeing a young man picking fruits from a green orchard with some difficulties is an indication that he has faced many problems and difficulties on his way to achieving his goals. Seeing a young man walking in the middle of a large green orchard is significant. It will bring him good and adequate nutrition and start a new and happy life with his beloved. See also: Interpretation of seeing a bath loofah in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing dry grass in a dream? Seeing dry yellow grass in a dream indicates that he will face serious problems and challenges in his life and loss of worry and sadness for him. You see yourself. Sitting on yellow grass in a dream is a sign warning him of illness and taking care of his health. Dreaming about cutting grass and throwing it in the trash indicates an attempt to absolve him of sins and disobedience and stay away from haters. What is the interpretation of green grass growing on the palm of my hand in a dream? Seeing green grass growing

title: Interpretation of a dream about sexual intercourse for a married woman with her husband, Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about intercourse for a married woman with her husband, according to Ibn Sirin. It is one of the dreams that is often sought to be interpreted, as the dream of intercourse is one of the natural dreams that carry many connotations based on the divine position, and there are many interpretations of this dream by interpreters, so it can symbolize Getting rid of the problems that he suffers from, including the person in his life, and here we provide an interpretation of a dream about sexual intercourse for a married woman with her husband. Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about intercourse for a married woman with her husband. There are many scholars’ opinions regarding the interpretation of a woman’s dream that her husband has intercourse with her in a dream, according to the difference in the state of intercourse and the woman’s condition as well. Let us present the interpretation of that. A married woman’s dream of having intercourse with her husband: When a wife sees that her husband wants to have intercourse with her and she does not want to, this indicates the deterioration of the relationship between them, where alienation prevails and a lack of love and happiness. When a woman sees that her husband is having intercourse with her in a dream, this brings good news and significance to her. On the improvement of her circumstances and her freedom from the issues that cause her suffering, and her life bears witness to love and stability. This vision indicates that the woman will obtain a prominent position in her work, which will be a source of abundant livelihood and a lot of money for her. If the wife sees that her husband is having intercourse with her during the forbidden time, then this It indicates that her husband is doing something forbidden, is angry with God, and is immoral, and he must return and sincerely repent to God. A married woman dreams of having intercourse with her husband Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin resorted to interpreting the dream of intercourse, and this depends on the nature of the vision, and here are the most important indications that appeared in the dream of intercourse For a married woman with her husband in Ibn Sirin, as it appears as follows: When the wife sees that she is unhappy in intercourse with her husband, this is evidence that there are many disagreements between them and the instability of marital life, and this may push them to divorce. Likewise, when a pregnant woman sees her husband having sex with her This indicates that she will be blessed with a male child and witness the birth with God’s help. Seeing intercourse expresses the love and contentment that prevails between the spouses and that they are about to resolve the disputes they are facing. If the wife works in one of the jobs, this is an indication of the prestigious position that the wife will reach. Interpretation of a dream about intercourse for a married woman with her husband from Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi also explains that seeing a married woman having sex with her husband is evidence that she will get a lot of money, get rid of worries, sorrows and obstacles between them, and their lives will change to a better state and then reach a stage of stability. It also indicates that The husband has obtained a luxurious and prestigious home at work, but if the husband has contact with his wife from behind, this indicates his bad character and that he is committing sins that God forbid. Interpretation of a dream about intercourse for a pregnant woman: The doctor directs the pregnant woman to the necessity of stopping intercourse in order to preserve the health of the fetus, and there is There are many interpretations of a dream about a husband having sex with a pregnant wife. The following is an interpretation of a dream: Intercourse for a pregnant woman: This may indicate that he has settled down.

title: Interpretation of cooking in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of cooking in a dream is what we will discuss in detail in this article. It is possible to see cooking in dreams continuously, as it is a daily process in every home and there are multiple interpretations of these dreams, whether good or bad, and through the following lines of the encyclopedia we will learn about multiple interpretations of the dream about cooking.Interpretation of cooking in a dreamIbn Sirin’s interpretation of cooking in a dreamIbn Sirin says Cooking in a dream is evidence of the dreamer’s success in life. A dream about cooking may indicate that there is a lot of money and a lot of livelihood on the way for the dreamer. Cooking in a dream can symbolize the enjoyment of visionary instincts and his intelligence. Whoever sees that he enters the kitchen and cooks, his dream It indicates that he will find a suitable job. Seeing cooked food full of fat means that the dreamer will make profits through illegal means, but if it is low in fat and grease, this indicates that the dreamer will earn little despite the many tasks he has undertaken. Interpretation of seeing a woman A single woman cooking in a dream: Seeing cooking in a dream of an unmarried woman indicates the approaching date of her wedding. If an unmarried woman dreams that she is cooking hibiscus, the dream indicates that she will achieve what she desires in her life. If a girl is cooking delicious food in a dream, this means that she is ready for marriage. To dream of an unmarried woman cooking rice means that she will travel soon. Cooking chicken in an unmarried woman’s dream symbolizes her marriage and that her married life will be happy. The kitchen in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates the upcoming marital home. If an unmarried woman dreams that she is cooking meat , it means that she will live. Kitchen utensils in a girl’s dream indicate the people she depends on, whether in her life or in her marriage. Everyone who sees her cooking pasta means that she will get a job soon. Interpretation of a dream about a married woman cooking. One of the auspicious dreams for a married woman is cooking ripe food, Because it indicates that she will become pregnant. If a married woman dreams that she is cooking couscous, this means that she is rich. Seeing a married woman cooking rice in a dream means that she will soon move to a new home. A married woman’s dream of cooking meat indicates that a lot of food is coming to her. If A married woman sees that her kitchen is messy, this indicates that she is going through many problems and fears in her life. Seeing a married woman cooking in her bedroom or under her bed symbolizes that she will become pregnant soon. If you see that she is cooking and it tastes sweet, this means that she is living a happy married life. Interpretation of seeing a pregnant woman cooking in a dream: To dream of a pregnant woman cooking, means that her due date will be soon. If you see her cooking meat with rice, this means that she will give birth to a male child. If a pregnant woman sees herself cooking baked goods, her dream indicates that she will give birth to a female child. Interpretation A man’s dream of cookingIf a single person dreams that he is cooking delicious food, this means that he will get married soon. Anyone who sees in his dream that he is cooking means that he will achieve a certain project that he has been planning for a long time.

Anyone who sees in his dream that he is cooking means that he will achieve a certain project that he has been planning for a long time.

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about a big house for a married woman?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a large and spacious house for a married woman is one of the visions that most women see because of their future ambitions and constant thinking about building a house for their children to ensure a decent life for them, and some of them are in a hurry to find out its correct interpretation. Interpretation of a dream about a large and spacious house for married women carries the interpretation of a dream about a large and spacious house for a married woman, according to opinions Interpreters, a sign of complete contentment and contentment with life with her husband, even if it is difficult. A woman’s dream of a large and spacious house also leads to ample livelihood and the achievement of a certain goal after a long wait for her and her partner. The dreamer’s vision of a large and spacious house may indicate a strong longing And nostalgia for the past before marriage, if it was old. Which has a website. Interpretation of dreams online from Google. There are many interpretations and questions about followers that you can see. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream of a large and spacious house for a married woman. The respected scholar Ibn Sirin sees that a large and spacious house is for a woman A married woman in a dream means wealth and the abundance of goodness and grace that she enjoys and enjoys. A dream of a large and spacious house for a married woman indicates getting rid of the worries and difficulties that hinder the course of her life during this period. A woman entering a large and spacious house in her dream indicates pregnancy with good offspring, whether it is Children or grandchildren. Ibn Sirin showed that a large, spacious house for a married woman indicates a change in circumstances for the better, and if she is sick, the time for her recovery will be soon. Interpretation of a dream about a large, spacious house for a pregnant woman. Interpretation of a dream about a large, spacious house for a pregnant woman indicates that the fetus inside her womb is male, and in If the dreamer is in the last months of pregnancy, this indicates the ease of giving birth to a child while she is pregnant. The child will be healthy, and her life will be full of that period and the good luck she enjoys with her husband. Interpretation of a dream about a new, big, big house for a married womanCommentators say that if one sees the large and spacious house in a married woman’s dream, this indicates that she wants to give up a sin and repent to God And he asked for contentment and forgiveness from him. Some jurists believe that if the dreamer sees a wide and spacious house, this is a sign that she will give birth to a new baby, and the dream interpretation of the spacious house and living in it could be a sign of her husband obtaining a new home. Business opportunity. Interpretation of a dream about a large, old house for a married woman: A dream about a large, spacious, and old house for a married woman shows that there is a close relationship with her husband and children and she is afraid of anything for them. The dreamer’s vision of entering a large, spacious, but old house indicates that she is happy with a stable life with her husband, and they are bound by bonds of love and affection with each other. The dreamer’s vision of a large, spacious house built of old black clay, shows the extent of tenderness and peace inside it, and that he loves kindness to others and does not He holds a grudge against someone.Interpretation of a dream about building a large and spacious house for a married woman.Interpretation of a dream for a married woman who was building a large and spacious house in...

title: Interpretation of seeing a chameleon in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a chameleon by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing a chameleon in a dream as not being good for the dreamer, and seeing a chameleon may indicate war, and this interpretation is based on the similarity of the letters between the chameleon and war, and seeing a chameleon may be. It refers to kings and rulers. Interpretation of seeing a chameleon for a single woman. A single woman who sees a chameleon in a dream has many interpretations that differ depending on the color of the chameleon in the dream. Seeing a gray chameleon in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates a lack of clarity in some issues in her life, and these issues may be related to With marriage. As for seeing a red chameleon in your dream, it indicates impulsiveness, wrong behavior, and making wrong and inappropriate decisions, which requires you to be careful and vigilant. As for seeing a black chameleon, this dream is not good for a single girl, and indicates the presence of a person in her life who represents problems and obstacles. In her life, whether in the field of work or in her love life. Interpretation of seeing a chameleon in a dream for a married woman. A married woman who sees a chameleon in a dream indicates unwanted changes in her life and a change in her situation for the worse. Seeing a green chameleon in a married woman’s dream, this solution is worthy Praise, and it can refer to the joy, nourishment, and happiness that she enjoys. We see slaughtering a chameleon in a dream, this is a good sign for her and the death of worries and sorrows. As for a woman who sees a chameleon eating from tree leaves, this dream is worthy of praise and good. As for whoever sees a chameleon eating from her house, this The dream does not bode well for her. If you dream of chameleon meat in a dream, a married woman, then this dream indicates something good that will come, God willing, and it may refer to a brother, husband, or father. As for her who sees a cooked chameleon in a dream, this dream is a system A pregnant woman who sees a black chameleon, this indicates that the child is male. As for who she sees in the dream? A green chameleon. This dream is good for her safety and the safety of her fetus. If you see a red chameleon, this The dream indicates the approaching date of birth. Interpretation of seeing a chameleon bite in a dream Seeing a chameleon bite in a dream has many interpretations and explanations. Whoever dreams of being bitten by a green chameleon, this is a good sign for the fortuneteller and indicates the patient’s recovery from illness, and may indicate the death of worries and sorrows. As for seeing a red chameleon biting the dreamer, this is an unpleasant dream and indicates that the dreamer has been affected by evil, whether in money, the soul, or possessions. As for seeing a black chameleon biting in a dream, this indicates hatred, evil, and hatred from some people around the fortuneteller. As for seeing a yellow chameleon biting, this dream is not good. Therefore, we have provided you with all possible explanations for seeing a chameleon of different colors in a dream. Anyone who has Seeing and wanting to explain it, we receive your comments at the bottom of the article on the site and we will give you the explanation as soon as possible.

title: Find out the interpretation of a dream about entering the bathroom with someone I know

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about entering the bathroom with someone I know Seeing yourself entering the bathroom with someone is considered a strange and undesirable thing. As for dreams, do their meanings indicate good or evil, or does this dream have another meaning? We will explain all the interpretations and meanings so that the dreamer's heart is reassured and he is not distracted by many interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about entering the bathroom with someone I know Many interpretation experts have confirmed that seeing someone entering the bathroom with someone I know in a dream means that there are many loyal people in the dreamer's life who wish him all the love and success in his life, whether it is. My work or my personal. Seeing myself entering the toilet with someone I know while a man is sleeping indicates the end of all the problems and crises in which lack of money was the main factor. However, if the dreamer sees the entrance of someone he knows entering the bathroom with him while he is taking a shower in his sleep, this is evidence that he is asking God to forgive him for what he did before. Dreaming of a man entering the bathroom with someone he knows means that he will have many happy events that will make him in a state of joy and extreme happiness. However, if the dreamer sees himself entering the bathroom accompanied by someone he knows, and the bathroom was clean during his sleep, this means that he is a good person who has many unique and personal qualities that many people love. Interpretation of a dream about entering the bathroom with someone I know by Ibn Sirin The great scholar Ibn Sirin said that seeing the dreamer entering the bathroom with someone he knows in a dream indicates that he has accomplished many things that are of great importance to him. While, if a divorced woman sees in her dream that she is entering the bathroom with someone she knows, this is a sign that there are many people involved in her matter and she must be very careful so as not to be harmed more. But if a girl sees that she is entering the bathroom with someone she knows in her dream, this means She will reach the highest levels of knowledge that will make her gain a great position and status in the coming days. The Secrets of Dream Interpretation website is a website specialized in interpreting dreams in the Arab world, just type a site about the secrets of dream interpretation, search for it on Google and get the correct interpretations. Interpretation of dreams about entering the toilet with someone I know for individuals If an unmarried woman sees herself entering the bathroom with someone she knows in her dream and feels happy, this is a sign that she will receive many happy events and wonderful occasions that will compensate her for any stages of fatigue and despair that she has gone through. Before. Dreaming of going to the bathroom with someone she knows for a single woman is a sign that she will easily overcome the problems and crises in her life because she is a person who speaks and has a conscience. If a girl sees that she is entering the bathroom with her lover in a dream, this means that their relationship is based on understanding and love and that they accept any problem that arises in their lives calmly and quietly to get rid of it. While if the owner of the dream is a student and sees herself entering the bathroom with someone she knows in her dream, this indicates her excellence and high grades during this academic year. title: Interpretation of walking in the rain in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of walking in the rain in a dream: Rain is one of God’s countless blessings for human beings. She is kind and a blessing and helps them water their crops and drink the good water in which every living being lives. Seeing rain in a dream is good news that shows a person’s infinite strength, and in the article we collected all the information related to the dream of walking in the rain... so follow the interpretation of walking in the rain in a dream. Majeed interpretation scholars point to many evidence of walking in the rain, including: Interpretation of the dream of walking in the rain It means that the dreamer feels happy, positive, and stable conditions. If a merchant dreams that he is walking in the rain, this is evidence of popularity, an increase in his trade, and an improvement in his financial situation. When you walk in the rain and pray, it means that God will respond to your desires and fulfill your dreams. When a girl takes a shower while walking in the rain in In a dream, this is interpreted as having a good character and being close to God. The online dream interpretation site from Google contains many interpretations and questions from fans that you can view. Interpretation of walking in the rain in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin tells us that walking in the rain is good news and blessings, It has other interpretations, which are: When you walk in the rain in a dream, it means that you are a strong person and you love people and always try to help them. It also indicates that walking in the rain is a clear indication of increased nutrition and improvement of the material conditions for the fortuneteller. Interpretation of walking in the rain in a dream for a single woman if she sees An unmarried woman herself walks in the rain in a dream, this indicates that she will enjoy the abundance of goodness that comes to her from God. When a girl walks in the rain in the summer and feels joy in a dream, this indicates the closeness of her connection with a person. If the girl sees that her clothes are wet from walking under Rain and rain in a dream, this is a sign that she will be exposed to a big problem related to her reputation among people. Interpretation of walking in the rain in a dream for a married woman When a married woman walks in a dream in the rain in a dream, this is a sign that God has blessed her with goodness and prosperity, and that she will enjoy a happy family life and will be removed. All the problems that disturb her life. If a woman is sick and sees herself walking in the rain in a dream, this indicates a quick recovery and getting rid of fatigue. If a married woman washes in the rain, this indicates a pure heart and a love of doing good deeds, so rain is a sign from God that eases Of stress and anxiety. When a wife walks in the rain with her husband in a dream and suffers from accumulated debts, this is evidence of an expansion in livelihood and that God will bless them with abundant funds to enable them to repay debts. Interpretation of walking in the rain in a dream for a pregnant womanIf a pregnant woman sees herself walking under Light rain and she feels happy in the dream, this symbolizes that her birth will be easy and God will bless her with a healthy child. If a pregnant woman says a prayer while walking in the rain, this is a sign that the Creator will answer his prayer in reality. Imam Al-Osaimi indicates that walking in heavy rain is for a pregnant woman while she is in Ha

Interpretation of walking in the rain in a dream for a pregnant womanIf a pregnant woman sees herself walking under Light rain and she feels happy in the dream, this symbolizes that her birth will be easy and God will bless her with a healthy child. If a pregnant woman says a prayer while walking in the rain, this is a sign that the Creator will answer his prayer in reality.
